General.Name: Kamux Oyj
General.Description: Kamux Oyj engages in the retail and wholesale of used cars. It operates car showrooms in Finland, Sweden, and Germany, as well as through digital channels. The company also offers financing and insurance products; and sells used cars in auctions, as well as various integrated services to consumer and corporate customers. Kamux Oyj was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Hämeenlinna, Finland.

5.Name: Jarkko  Lehtismaki M.Sc.
5.Title: Chief Digital Officer of Devel. and Management of Digital & ICT Infrastructure
